text: Pathanapuram Block Panchayat is a Block Panchayat in Kollam district, Kerala state, India. The headquarters of this block panchayat is in Pidavoor, Pathanapuram. == Panchayats in the block == There are six Grama Panchayats in Pathanapuram Block Panchayat: #Vilakkudy #Thalavoor #Piravanthoor #Pathanapuram #Pattazhi #Pattazhi Vadakkekkara == References == == Other websites == Pathanapuram block panchayat office location Category:Kerala
title: Pathanapuram Block Panchayat
